abstract_ssm: This collection contains materials documenting Edward L. Hyman's career in entertainment, including a scrapbook relating to his time as Manager of the Mark Strand Theatre, clippings, articles, reports, speeches, trade press publications, and other information on motion picture distribution.
corpname_ssm: Mark Strand Theatre (Brooklyn, New York, N.Y.)
